content: What details are required to submit a Mark Visit?
The details required to submit a Mark Visit include the customer information, visit date, visit purpose, and any related observations or actions.
Can I submit a Mark Visit without a visit report?
No, a visit report is mandatory to complete the Mark Visit submission.
How can I track the status of my Mark Visit submission?
You can track the status of your Mark Visit submission via the application portal, which will show whether the visit is approved or pending.
Is there any penalty for submitting a Mark Visit late?
Late submission of a Mark Visit may lead to delays in order processing or missing out on certain benefits, but no direct penalty is imposed.
Can a Mark Visit be submitted multiple times for the same customer?
Yes, a Mark Visit can be submitted multiple times for the same customer if there are additional visits or updates required.
The Mark Visit is approved by the respective authority, usually the FR or higher management within the organization.
Is a Mark Visit necessary for every customer order?
A Mark Visit is required based on the order criteria and conditions, such as minimum visit requirements for a particular region or program.
Can a Mark Visit be submitted without a GSTN number?
A GSTN number is required if the cumulative order value exceeds 1 Lac; otherwise, it is not mandatory.
Can I cancel a Mark Visit after submission?
Once submitted, a Mark Visit cannot be canceled. However, you can request corrections or updates through the system.
